segments.text: The boy is really taking a risk standing on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so focused on the cookie jar, he doesn't realize how dangerous it is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and he's stretching too far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't watch, I'm so worried he's going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is encouraging him, her hand reaching up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to think it's all fun and games.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But she doesn't understand the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would stop them before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there, but she's completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's in her own little world, drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR
